body:
```
$ python --version
Python 3.6.0

$ cython --version
Cython version 0.25.2

$ gcc --version
gcc (GCC) 6.2.1 20160830
Copyright (C) 2016 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
This is free software; see the source for copying conditions.  There is NO
warranty; not even for MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
```
```
$ cat foo.pyx
#cython: binding=True

def main(double[:] foo):
    pass
```
```
$ cythonize -b foo.pyx
Compiling /tmp/foo/foo.pyx because it changed.
[1/1] Cythonizing /tmp/foo/foo.pyx
running build_ext
building 'foo' extension
gcc -pthread -Wno-unused-result -Wsign-compare -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O3 -Wall -Wstrict-prototypes -march=x86-64 -mtune=generic -O2 -pipe -fstack-protector-strong -march=x86-64 -mtune=generic -O2 -pipe -fstack-protector-strong -march=x86-64 -mtune=generic -O2 -pipe -fstack-protector-strong -fPIC -I/usr/include/python3.6m -c /tmp/foo/foo.c -o build/temp.linux-x86_64-3.6/tmp/foo/foo.o
/tmp/foo/foo.c:7373:20: warning: ‘__pyx_mdef_15View_dot_MemoryView_10memoryview_23copy_fortran’ defined but not used [-Wunused-variable]
 static PyMethodDef __pyx_mdef_15View_dot_MemoryView_10memoryview_23copy_fortran = {"copy_fortran", (PyCFunction)__pyx_memoryview_copy_fortran, METH_NOARGS, 0};
                    ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
/tmp/foo/foo.c:7281:20: warning: ‘__pyx_mdef_15View_dot_MemoryView_10memoryview_21copy’ defined but not used [-Wunused-variable]
 static PyMethodDef __pyx_mdef_15View_dot_MemoryView_10memoryview_21copy = {"copy", (PyCFunction)__pyx_memoryview_copy, METH_NOARGS, 0};
                    ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
/tmp/foo/foo.c:7209:20: warning: ‘__pyx_mdef_15View_dot_MemoryView_10memoryview_19is_f_contig’ defined but not used [-Wunused-variable]
 static PyMethodDef __pyx_mdef_15View_dot_MemoryView_10memoryview_19is_f_contig = {"is_f_contig", (PyCFunction)__pyx_memoryview_is_f_contig, METH_NOARGS, 0};
                    ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
/tmp/foo/foo.c:7137:20: warning: ‘__pyx_mdef_15View_dot_MemoryView_10memoryview_17is_c_contig’ defined but not used [-Wunused-variable]
 static PyMethodDef __pyx_mdef_15View_dot_MemoryView_10memoryview_17is_c_contig = {"is_c_contig", (PyCFunction)__pyx_memoryview_is_c_contig, METH_NOARGS, 0};
                    ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
gcc -pthread -shared -Wl,-O1,--sort-common,--as-needed,-z,relro -Wl,-O1,--sort-common,--as-needed,-z,relro build/temp.linux-x86_64-3.6/tmp/foo/foo.o -L/usr/lib -lpython3.6m -o /tmp/foo/foo.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so
```

I guess it should just be a matter of using the CYTHON_UNUSED macro at the right place.
title: unused-variable warning with binding=True directive
